Judge who wanted to ban mifepristone refuses to dismiss case  —  The federal judge who unsuccessfully tried to ban the medication abortion drug mifepristone nationwide back in 2023 announced on Thursday that he is keeping a version of the case alive for now.

Moon added to list of threatened cultural sites for first time  —  Potential looting and commercial trips pose risk to artefacts left by lunar landings, says World Monuments Fund  —  The moon has been placed on a list of threatened heritage sites, owing to fears of potential looting and destruction caused by planned commercial trips.
